item.description: girl finder @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans&display=swap'); html { font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; } .quiz-slider { margin-top: 50px; max-width: 100%; } h2, h3, p { text-align: center; } input[type='range'] { -webkit-appearance: none; width: 100%; margin-top: 50px; } input[type='text'] { width: 30%; } input[type='range']::-webkit-slider-runnable-track { -webkit-appearance: none; box-sizing: border-box; height: 1px; width: 100%; border: 3px solid #c4cdd5; } input[type='range']::-webkit-slider-thumb { -webkit-appearance: none; margin-top: -13px; height: 25px; width: 25px; border-radius: 50px; background-color: #000000; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.
